description: The popularity of Fireball whiskey has led to high demand for the product, making it one of the most sought-after liquors on the market. It wasnâ€™t long after people found out that the combination of this&nbsp;whiskey and root beer is an irresistible mix.The fireball's cinnamon note is a one-of-a-kind attribute that synchronizes well with the vanilla flavor in root beer. Another great quality about Fireball is that it is 66 proof. Although root beer itself does not contain much alcohol, Fireball's ABV makes it a whole other experience.
name: Fireball Root Beer

recipeInstructions.name: Put ice in a tall glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Put ice in a tall glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the Fireball and root beer. Give it a good stir.
